title: Biden Struggles To Contain Mounting Pressure To Drop Out Of Race
content: The drumbeat of pressure on Joe Biden to drop out of the US presidential race intensified Wednesday with a bombshell report in the New York Times that he had conceded the possibility to a key ally.
summary: The drumbeat of pressure on Joe Biden to drop out of the US presidential race intensified Wednesday with a bombshell report in the New York Times that he had conceded the possibility to a key ally.

title: Japan Railway Unveils Humanoid Robot For Safer, Smarter Rail Maintenance
content: It resembles a malevolent robot from 1980s sci-fi but West Japan Railway's new humanoid employee was designed with nothing more sinister than a spot of painting and gardening in mind.
summary: It resembles a malevolent robot from 1980s sci-fi but West Japan Railway's new humanoid employee was designed with nothing more sinister than a spot of painting and gardening in mind.

title: What Biden Said On Reports That He's Dropping Out Of US Presidential Race
content: President Joe Biden on Wednesday asserted that he is the nominee of the Democratic Party for the November 5 presidential elections and there is no pressure on him to quit the race.
summary: President Joe Biden on Wednesday asserted that he is the nominee of the Democratic Party for the November 5 presidential elections and there is no pressure on him to quit the race.

title: Australian Missing Child's Remains Found After Suspected Crocodile Attack
content: Australian police said on Thursday it had located the remains believed to be that of a missing 12-year-old child reportedly attacked by a crocodile in the country's north.
summary: Australian police said on Thursday it had located the remains believed to be that of a missing 12-year-old child reportedly attacked by a crocodile in the country's north.

title: Indian-American Nikki Haley Jabs Journalist Over Biden's Term Prediction
content: Indian American politician Nikki Haley on Wednesday took a jibe at top American journalist George Stephanopoulos who had questioned her claim that President Joe Biden would not complete his first term.
summary: Indian American politician Nikki Haley on Wednesday took a jibe at top American journalist George Stephanopoulos who had questioned her claim that President Joe Biden would not complete his first term.

title: Japan Government Ends Use Of Floppy Disks In Bid To Modernise Bureaucracy
content: Japan's government has finally eliminated the use of floppy disks in all its systems, two decades since their heyday, reaching a long-awaited milestone in a campaign to modernise the bureaucracy.
summary: Japan's government has finally eliminated the use of floppy disks in all its systems, two decades since their heyday, reaching a long-awaited milestone in a campaign to modernise the bureaucracy.

title: Rishi Sunak: UK Conservative Leader Hoping To Defy All Predictions
content: The UK Conservatives hoped Rishi Sunak would stabilise the party and country when they made him leader following his predecessors' chaotic tenures. Instead, he has led them to the brink of electoral wipeout.
summary: The UK Conservatives hoped Rishi Sunak would stabilise the party and country when they made him leader following his predecessors' chaotic tenures. Instead, he has led them to the brink of electoral wipeout.

title: UK General Elections Live Updates: UK Votes In Historic Polls Today
content: Britain's political leaders made a frantic push for votes late Wednesday in the last hours of an election campaign expected to return a Labour government after 14 years of Conservative rule.
summary: Britain's political leaders made a frantic push for votes late Wednesday in the last hours of an election campaign expected to return a Labour government after 14 years of Conservative rule.

title: UK Election 2024: Hour-By-Hour Guide To How The Results Come In
content: The UK votes Thursday to decide whether Labour Party leader Keir Starmer can end 14 years of opposition and win the keys to 10 Downing Street, or whether - somehow - Prime Minister Rishi Sunak can buck the polls.
summary: The UK votes Thursday to decide whether Labour Party leader Keir Starmer can end 14 years of opposition and win the keys to 10 Downing Street, or whether - somehow - Prime Minister Rishi Sunak can buck the polls.

title: Rishi Sunak Ramps Up Fear Factor In Last-Ditch Election Push
content: Labour leader Keir Starmer dismissed as "desperate" Rishi Sunak's last-gasp efforts to stoke fears about the opposition party winning a huge majority at Thursday's UK election.
summary: Labour leader Keir Starmer dismissed as "desperate" Rishi Sunak's last-gasp efforts to stoke fears about the opposition party winning a huge majority at Thursday's UK election.

title: In Pics: Key Faces In UK Elections 2024
content: UK Elections 2024 has boiled down to a close fight between the incumbent Prime Minister Rishi Sunak and the Labour Party's Keir Starmer. However, there are some other big faces who could be influential in the UK Polls this time.
summary: UK Elections 2024 has boiled down to a close fight between the incumbent Prime Minister Rishi Sunak and the Labour Party's Keir Starmer. However, there are some other big faces who could be influential in the UK Polls this time.

title: Your Guide To UK General Election
content: British voters go to the polls on Thursday in a general election to choose new members of parliament.

title: UK Election: Number Of Seats, Candidates, Voters And Polling Stations
content: Here are some of the key numbers as UK voters go to the polls Thursday in a general election predicted to see the ruling Conservatives dumped out of office after 14 years.

title: 'Magic' Sword, Stuck In Stone For Over 1,300 Years, Vanishes In France
content: An ancient sword, said to be indestructible and the sharpest in the world, has disappeared from a French town, where it was lodged in a rock for over 1,300 years.
summary: An ancient sword, said to be indestructible and the sharpest in the world, has disappeared from a French town, where it was lodged in a rock for over 1,300 years.

title: Trump Has A Six Point Lead Over Biden After Debate: Report
content: Donald Trump has developed a six per cent lead over his Democratic rival incumbent Joe Biden with 80 percent saying that the current White House occupant is too old to run for a second term, according to a latest poll by The Wall Street Journal.
summary: Donald Trump has developed a six per cent lead over his Democratic rival incumbent Joe Biden with 80 percent saying that the current White House occupant is too old to run for a second term, according to a latest poll by The Wall Street Journal.

title: Biden "Absolutely Not" Pulling Out Of US Presidential Race: White House
content: Joe Biden is "absolutely not" pulling out of the White House race, his spokeswoman said Wednesday, as pressure mounted on the president following his disastrous debate performance against Donald Trump.
summary: Joe Biden is "absolutely not" pulling out of the White House race, his spokeswoman said Wednesday, as pressure mounted on the president following his disastrous debate performance against Donald Trump.

title: 9 In 10 Gazans Displaced Since War Began: UN
content: Around nine in every 10 people in the Gaza Strip have been displaced at least once since the war between Israel and Hamas began, the UN humanitarian agency said Wednesday.
summary: Around nine in every 10 people in the Gaza Strip have been displaced at least once since the war between Israel and Hamas began, the UN humanitarian agency said Wednesday.

title: "I Am Running": Biden Vows To Stay In Presidential Race
content: US President Joe Biden vowed to stay in the 2024 presidential race during a call with campaign staff on Wednesday and sought to reassure top Democrats on Capitol Hill that he is fit for re-election, despite his poor debate performance last week.
summary: US President Joe Biden vowed to stay in the 2024 presidential race during a call with campaign staff on Wednesday and sought to reassure top Democrats on Capitol Hill that he is fit for re-election, despite his poor debate performance last week.

title: Rishi Sunak 2.0 Or Return Of Labour? UK Votes In Historic Polls Today
content: Britain's political leaders made a final frantic push for votes Wednesday on the last day of an election campaign expected to return a Labour government after 14 years of Conservative rule.
summary: Britain's political leaders made a final frantic push for votes Wednesday on the last day of an election campaign expected to return a Labour government after 14 years of Conservative rule.

title: Myanmar Shop Owners Are Being Jailed For Raising Employee Wages. Here's Why
content: Wage increases are seen as undermining the regime by making people believe that inflation is rising.
summary: Wage increases are seen as undermining the regime by making people believe that inflation is rising.
